activities: DTI is a professional technologies company specializing in donor management software, donation software and other non-profit software technologies. Our flagship product GiftWrap Plus is a web-based donor management application that integrates the vast majority of non-profit business processes. From online donations, shopping carts, volunteer forms, event registration and pledge collection to detailed analysis and email management, GiftWrap Plus is helping hundreds of non profit and political organizations all across the world.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
